description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Lisbon, Portugal. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Five-Star Lisbon Luxury with High-End Day Spa
hotels.description: Discover the rolling hills and iconic yellow trams of Lisbon, Portugal from the five-star Corinthia Lisbon - a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 winner boasting spectacular views over the city. The hotel epitomises style and luxury: public spaces are flooded with natural light, surfaces are laid with fresh flowers and chandeliers glitter. The onsite restaurant Erva serves up some of the city’s best local food. Meanwhile, Soul Garden is the go-to evening spot where you can chill out on a wooden cabana with a handcrafted cocktail in hand, listening to live music or DJ sets. When you need to soothe mind, body and soul, THE SPA with its heated jacuzzi, sauna and steam room awaits to pamper you. You’ll be well placed to discover Lisbon’s iconic sites from your stylish hotel base. Castelo de Sao Jorge, Alfama and Jerónimos Monastery are all within a 15-minute drive, while Lisbon Zoo and Águas Livres Aqueduct are also closeby. Don’t miss out on a ride aboard the 28E tram, a bucket-list experience for most visitors. The yellow, old-fashioned tram travels from Praça Martim Moniz to Campo de Ourique, skimming the city's famous steep hills.

hotels.title: Opulent Lisbon Stay in 13th Century Convent with Iconic Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Find refined elegance within the walls of a 13th-century Dominican Convent atConvent Square Lisbon, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel. From savoring delectable Portuguese cuisine at Capítulo Restaurant to embracing Portugal's stunning architecture in the emblematic cloister, every moment is an invitation to elevate your senses. Unwind in the sauna or rejuvenate in the heated plunge pool while gazing at Lisbon's breathtaking church top views.

hotels.title: Five-Star Central Lisbon Escape near Parque Eduardo VII and Marquis of Pombal Square
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of romance and five-star elegance at the EPIC SANA Marquês Hotel. This luxury haven is positioned in the heart of Lisbon and is a stone's throw from the city's cultural treasures, including the renowned Marquis of Pombal Square and the verdant Eduardo VII Park. Savour the finest Portuguese cuisine at one of the hotel's three sumptuous restaurants, two bars and bakery, before ascending to the rooftop bar to sip on exquisite cocktails against Lisbon's enchanting skyline.

hotels.title: Heritage Lisbon Art Deco Escape with Daily Breakfast & Museum Pass
hotels.description: Allow yourself to be captivated by the magic of Lisbon with a stay at Hotel Britania Art Deco, a Lisbon Heritage Collection - a historic property perfectly positioned for you to explore this little pocket of Portuguese bliss. The hotel proudly retains the glamour of the 1940s courtesy of a spectacular design by Cassiano Branco, a famous Portuguese modernist architect, transporting you back in time, while modern amenities bring you back to the present.

hotels.title: Five-Star Lisbon Stay with Old Town & Tagus River Views
hotels.description: Five-star comfort meets contemporary design and breathtaking vistas at InterContinental Lisbon, an IHG Hotel. Experience culinary masterpieces at Akla Restaurant, savour Portuguese wine at Uptown Bar or gaze out over the stunning Lisbon skyline from the comfort of a private terrace. Indulge in a spot of shopping at the boutiques on the famous Avenida da Liberdade, admire verdant views of Eduardo VII Park or discover the local area's historic monuments and monasteries.

hotels.title: Lisbon Ocean-View Luxury with a Nine-Hole Golf Course
hotels.description: Stay a stone's throw from the Atlantic Ocean at Crowne Plaza Caparica Lisbon, an IHG Hotel, a modern hideaway located along the pristine 26-kilometre stretch of golden shoreline in Costa da Caparica. Spend sunny days basking by the outdoor swimming pool, practice your swing at the nine-hole golf course, or opt to treat yourself to a massage, body wrap or steam bath at the spa. For all-day dining, Raimundo is your go-to for authentic Portuguese cuisine and tasty regional morsels.

hotels.title: Elegant Heritage Escape in the Heart of Lisbon
hotels.description: Framed by a 16th-century façade in the heart of Portugal's vibrant capital, Pousada de Lisboa is a boutique hotel promising urban luxe with historic charm just moments from Lisbon's top attractions. Part of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and ranked in Tripadvisor's top 1% of properties worldwide, this former house for kings and forum for ministries has been beautifully restored into a luxury city launchpad. This elegant city hotel with first-class features is surrounded by timeless beauty in a prime location opposite the popular Praça do Comércio and Tagus River. Sip a 'bica' along the A Brasileira esplanade, hop between the myriad of bookstores, museums, and irresistible bakeries, or stroll along the south bank to catch panoramic sunset views. Back at the hotel, take time to admire the lavish paintings and intricate sculptures, sink your teeth into a sumptuous steak at the trendy RIB Beef & Wine restaurant serving signature cuts with Portuguese flair, or plunge into the outdoor pool and soak up the Mediterranean sun with a cocktail in hand.

hotels.title: Five-Star Heritage Palace Escape in the Heart of Lisbon with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Experience the history and magic of a beautifully restored 16th-century palace at The One Palácio de Anunciada, one of Lisbon’s finest five-star hotels. Nestled in a narrow, cobblestoned street, just one back from the city’s main thoroughfare, Avenida de Liberdade, this luxury lodging is perfectly positioned for exploring the best of the city’s laneways and lookouts. Wander down the Avenida to find the iconic Praça dos Restauradores, before stopping at one of the many cafés or bars in the district for a traditional pastel de nata snack. You'll find a garden paradise at The One Palácio de Anunciada, with expansive French-style greenery to explore. Spend sunny days by the central fountain and century-old dragon tree in the inner courtyard, or admire the full grounds from your panoramic position in the rooftop swimming pool. Settle in for an afternoon of relaxation at the Despacio Spa, where you’ll find a Finnish sauna, plunge pool and treatments that range from essential oil massages to diamond facials. After a day of exploring Lisbon, engage all your senses at Condes de Ericeira Restaurant or sample the Portuguese wine or curated collection of cocktails at O Jardim Wine Bar, both found in the palace's meticulously restored noble rooms.
